item.title: Shading and Rendering in Blender
item.description: 1 style: bullet | number | inline (default: bullet) min_depth: number (default: 0) max_depth: number (default: 6) title: string (default: undefined) allow_inconsistent_headings: boolean (default: false) delimiter: string (default: |) varied_style: boolean (default: false) Agenda Retopology Grease pencil refresher Shading Exercise Rendering What is Rendering?
